title: 2x2 w/Den, 5th Floor, Balcony, Corner Unit, 1257 SqFt, A/C
posting_body: The historic setting of the perfectly modern Stack House is more than an apartment complex—it's the place where you can unpack your life and let it unfold.
Combining green living with warm character, fast technology, and sleek good looks, Stack House will be your soothing urban refuge.

Sleek stainless steel appliances, High efficiency water fixtures, Very low utility bills, Contemporary cabinetry with soft-close hardware, Energy and water efficient front-load washer/dryers, Vinyl plank in living areas, Energy Star-rated stainless steel kitchen appliances, Walk-in closets in many homes, Quartz countertops in kitchens and bathrooms

Ample resident storage, Media/gaming room with gaming stations and surround-sound big screen, Community lounge with chef's kitchen, billiards, and dining area, Generous resident transfer policy, Dog run, Conference room and business center, Parking, Smoke-free, pet-friendly policies, Separate bike storage, Rainwater collection on living roofs, Fitness center with cardio equipment and free-weights, Free printer, scanner, and fax machine for resident use, Community pea-patch garden, Sports court, Two community decks + grills and views
Pets welcome, some breed restrictions apply.
3 times the rent, or a guarantor
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
